name: dentist
content:

A2 a person whose job is treating people's teeth: You should have your teeth checked by a dentist at least twice a year.
LuckyBusiness/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages dentist's
the place where a dentist carries out their job: I've got to go to the dentist's on Friday.
